title: A Great place for you & your family. Reserve your home today!
posting_body: ['Take advantage of this amazing special.', 'Don’t miss out on this one-time special pricing from $999- $1499 on selected apartments homes', 'Not only do you save on the application and administrative fee with our look and lease special, but you can also save August 2022 rent when moving in by 8/12/2022', 'This community is in Houston at 1000 Country Place Dr.\xa0 in the 77079 area.', 'Selection from various 2- and 3-bedroom floor plans options with prices that beats the competition.', "Our lovely community offers amenities and features that you'll enjoy.", 'These include high-speed internet access, renovated gym, and an amazing spacious swimming pool.', "It's time to love where you live.", 'Stop by for a visit us today.', '-Separate Shower', '-Fitness Center', '-Laundry Facilities', '-Swimming Pool', '-Tile Backsplash on selected homes', '-Walk-In Closet', '-Close to Shopping', '-2 Inch Fauxwood Blinds', '-Pet friendly', '-Washer and Dryer connections on selected homes', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'and ask for Selena and Jessica or you can also send us an email to Amalfi at bluestonepremier dot com', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '- Near Thornwood Elementary,', 'Spring Forest Middle School, Spring branch High School (Award Winning ISD School).', '- Near Memorial City Mall.', 'The Park at Amalfi', '1000 Country Place Dr.', 'Houston, Texas 77079', '***PRICES AND AVAILABILITY ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE***', '***PICTURES MAY NOT REFLECT ACTUAL APARTMENT***', '*** WE COMPLY WITH EQUAL OPPORTUNITY HOUSING***']
